data.title: 5 Iconic Roles Played By Zeenat Aman That Won Our Hearts
meta_keywords: Zeenat Aman Roles That Won Our Hearts
data.meta_description: Roma in Don, Sunita in Yaadon Ki Baaraat, Roopa in Satyam Shivam Sundaram, Reshmi in Ajnabi, and Sheela in Qurbani these 5 Iconic Roles Played By Zeenat Aman Won Our Hearts
data.text:
Roma in Don (1978)

Zeenat Aman's mesmerising portrayal of Roma, a fearless and stylish woman, added a touch of glamour and intrigue to the classic action film.

Sunita in Yaadon Ki Baaraat (1973)

Zeenat Aman's unforgettable performance as Sunita in Yaadon Ki Baaraat showcased her as the quintessential '70s Bollywood diva, with her striking beauty and charismatic screen presence.

Roopa in Satyam Shivam Sundaram (1978)

In Satyam Shivam Sundaram, Zeenat Aman delivered a bold and fearless performance, portraying a character whose inner beauty shines through despite her physical disfigurement.

Reshmi in Ajnabi (1974)

Zeenat Aman's portrayal of a woman caught in a web of mystery and intrigue showcased her versatility as an actress. Her performance was a blend of sophistication and vulnerability.

Sheela in Qurbani (1980)

In the action-packed Qurbani, Zeenat Aman's character was a strong and independent woman who stood out with her glamorous yet confident persona. Her performance in the iconic song "Laila O Laila" made her a symbol of sensuality and style.
